description: Try our easy to follow Easter Surprise Layered Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easter Surprise Layered Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt coloured candy-coated mini chocolate easter eggs

recipeInstructions.text: Add some of the remaining chocolate buttercream to the inside of the top 2 layers of the stack. Fill the centre hole with Easter eggs/marshmallows to third layer. Crumble 2 of the darkest cake cut-outs to a fine crumb and mostly fill the remainder of the centre hole. Leave a trail of Easter eggs and marshmallows on top of cake, plate and across table.

Add some of the remaining chocolate buttercream to the inside of the top 2 layers of the stack. Fill the centre hole with Easter eggs/marshmallows to third layer.
